entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High 6.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle after midnight. Rain beginning overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 5 mm. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High 15.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
